sub_title: Data Enthusiast | Helping Companies Achieve More With Data
summary:
I have always been interested in data.
However, back in the day this wasn’t always evident. I recall a day when I was young where I took a piece of paper and enumerated every letter I came across in my book. End result: the letter ‘E’ was most common, letters such as ‘Q’ and ‘X’ the least. 
The analytical aspect of this exercise is quite easy. But how could this possibly benefit me. I recently philosophized about this. A possible added value could be a better grasp of the occurrence of letters in the Dutch language, making solving puzzles easier. 

In my opinion, the analytical and business side of data should go hand in hand. Always.
My passion lies in solving problems to make thing better, more efficient, using the innovative technologies and tools that are currently available. With the rising importance of AI, Big Data, Internet of Things (IoT) and all the other buzzwords the world of Data & Analytics has become even more interesting than it already was. Professions such as data translators, data analysts and data scientists who can understand the need of the business and have the know-how to solve specific problems are rising in importance.

What can we do with these developments and how can we make sure businesses ánd people profit from these vast amounts of available data? Whether it is to determine, visualize, analyze or solve a problem. I love to explore these questions in a team of motivated and diverse group of enthusiasts where we face new challenges whenever a problem is solved. 

Have I made you more interested in Data? I am always looking for new challenges, new adventures and new opportunities to help companies grow in their data proficiency.

Reach out to me via a DM or invite me on LinkedIn.

projects.title: Data Driven Solutions
projects.description:
Within KPN and its subsidiaries, several initiatives concerning data are simultaneously being developed. Data Driven Solutions (DDS) has been established with the purpose of centralizing these initiatives. Within DDS I have researched various data projects concerning privacy legislation GDPR (AVG). The 'Pragmatic Marketing Framework' was used for this. I also had a role in improving communication both internally within DDS and promoting DDS externally to other parts of KPN.

Responsibilities:
•	Maintain contacts at various parts of KPN and its subsidiaries to achieve alignment within the AVG are;
•	Drawing up an overarching proposition and vision on the future of AVG and what role KPN and its subsidiaries can play in this.

Result:
Vision on the future where Microsoft services are delivered on a large scale and where subsidiaries DearBytes and KPN Consulting play an advisory role in the field of GDPR if the customer has a need for this.

profile_positions.description:
Working in the Data Solutions department of Operations Financing. This department delivers information products to a wide range of internal clients to help them achieve their goals not only today, but especially in the future.

In my role as Data Scientist I make impact by:
• Process, clean, interpret and visualize large amounts of data.
• Develop and validate forecasting models.
• Identify concrete improvements in business processes (model-based and data-driven) and translate them into business cases and practical improvement proposals.
• Develop innovative solutions based on techniques such as machine learning and OCR.
• Co-responsible for initiating and achieving project objectives.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist | Operations Finance Data Solutions

profile_positions.description: The core task of the Robotics Finance team is to build automation solutions for various operational domains within Rabobank (e.g. Housing and Business Lending). We make sure that the company has functional virtual colleagues (our automation solutions) that relieve them of repetitive tasks. In this role I am responsible for organizing the backlog for the business analysts and prioritizing for the developers and testers. My main contacts are the five development teams. These each consist of two developers, one tester and a business analyst. I also coordinate with stakeholders outside my own team such as Process & Product Managers and other robotics departments, mainly the Robotics Center of Excellence. The Robotics Finance team has been around for several years and has grown over the years from 1 to 5 teams.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner | Operations Finance Robotics

profile_positions.description: Scrum Master for 5 teams within the Robotics department of Operations Financing. Coaching and facilitating a total of 18 RPA Engineers, Testers and Business Engineers in the ways of scrum and process improvement. Also making sure we have all the insights necessary to track our work properly.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master | Operations Finance Robotics

profile_positions.description: Data Brewery is a company that helps other businesses make sense of their data. We take complex data and turn it into clear and actionable information that companies can use to make better decisions. We do this by creating easy-to-use dashboards, providing expert advice in KPI creation, and offering training programs tailored to each company's specific needs.
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
DataBrouwers delivers advice on strategy, analytics and implementation to provide companies more control by using their data. 

Data is more than just figures and techniques. It's about asking the right questions and basing your decisions on facts. Only then can you determine which Analyses or Machine Learning algorithms to use, or which visualisations are useful to support you in making the right choices.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
KPN Defense and National Security (KDNV) is a part of KPN which focuses on safety with regards to aid workers, justice and defense for a safer society. 
The physical and virtual world around us changes rapidly, the field of national security is no exception. This affects citizens and also professional aid workers. At the same time, emergency workers are faced with the challenge of achieving more safety with fewer resources.

As a Dutch company, KPN believes in the added value of smart use of ICT and cooperation as enablers for this challenge.

In my role as Data & Analytics Consultant I guide companies through the possibilities of working in a data driven fashion. These clients are both externally in the national security domain, but also internally within different departments at KPN.

I do this by delivering solutions in the form of:
☑	Workshops in the field of Power BI, Becoming Data Driven & Value Discovery;
☑	Advice on Data Strategy, Business Intelligence & Advanced Analytics;
☑	Building Advanced Algorithms & Models using Python, PySpark & R;
☑   Selecting and Developing Data Science Use Cases.

I have been working on the following projects:
• Data Scientist |  Scrum | GIT | Python | PySpark | OOP [Royal Netherlands Air Force]
• Management Consultant | 5G | Financial Control | Process Improvement [KPN Access & Core Networks]
• Business Analyst & BI Specialist | Security | Dashboarding | Power BI | KPI [KPN]
profile_positions.title: Senior Data & Analytics Consultant | KPN Defense and National Security (KDNV)

profile_positions.description:
KPN ICT Consulting provides customized IT services. Delivering the full journey from consulting about possbilities to the actual implementation and management of advanced solutions and technologies. 

In my role as Data & Analytics Consultant I guide companies through the possibilities of data. Whether the company is just curious about what data can do for them, already have a data & analytics department, or of course any step inbetween. The goal is always to make organizations more data driven and to make use of their own and external data.

I did this by delivering solutions in the form of:
☑	(Big) Data & Analytics Presentations;
☑	Workshops in the field of Power BI, Becoming Data Driven & Value Discovery;
☑	Advice on Data Strategy, Business Intelligence, Dashboarding & Advanced Analytics;
☑	Building Advanced Algorithms & Models using Python, Pyspark & R.

In these years I worked on several projects:
•	Data Scientist | R | Anomaly Detection | Time Series [KPN NIO]
•	Data Analyst | Python | Proof of Concept | NPS Predictor [KPN Internedservices]
•	Business Analyst | Strategy | Data Driven Solutions | GDPR [KPN & KPN ICT Consulting]
•	Data Analyst & Scientist | Power BI | Dashboards | Machine Learning [KPN Internedservices]
•	BI Specialist | Customer Segmentation | Azure DevOps | Power BI [Spaces.]
•	Management Consultant | KPIs | Strategy | Stakeholder Management [KPN Technology & Digital Office]
•	Analytics Translator | Project Management | Use Case Development | Operational Excellence [KPN Technology & Digital Office]
•	Data Scientist | Product Owner | Scrum | GIT | Python | PySpark | OOP [Confidential]
profile_positions.title: Data & Analytics Consultant | KPN ICT Consulting

profile_positions.description:
A one year traineeship with several programs and trainings such as ITIL, Prince2, Microsoft technologies and personal development.

In this year I worked on three projects:
•	Migration Consultant | Microsoft | Office 365 [Royal IHC]
•	IoT Consultant & Business Analyst | Smart locks | Benchmark [KPN New Business]
•	Data Analyst | R |  MOS [KPN NIO]

At the end of this year a capstone project was completed on the strategy how different departments of KPN (especially New Business and KPN ICT Consulting) should work together to become leading in the Smart City domain.
profile_positions.title: Young Professional Business Consultant | KPN ICT Consulting

profile_positions.description: Van Olphen Viande Select is a high quality meat supplier for the hospitality industry, catering and healthcare institutions. Particularly in the Southern provinces (North Brabant, Gelderland, South Holland, Utrecht, Zeeland and Noord-Limburg). As an All-round Production Employee at Van Olphen Viande Select I work at all different departments, mostly unsupervised. This includes a wide range of activities, such as independently preparing all poultry related orders.
